column4: hi, how do i install the new ubuntu if i dont have enough RAM to run the live CD (i got 63Mb, and i installed the last version fine..) tia
will they send me the alternate cd
i'm not sure, i'm afraid. Can you download it?
the whole reason i use ubuntu is bc they send it to me, got no bandwidth..
isn't there a system in SA to take a blank cd to a shop and burn it?
where would i find that out?
i'm sure it is another one of mark shuttleworth's projects. You could google for it
i dont see where the list is, but i guess if it's mark shuttleworth then it's got ubuntu on it?
there is one which i think is about 20 minutes drive away.. thanks alot!
